subject: Football
Lockouts
Free Agents (Sports)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: A series of court decisions that briefly opened the N.F.L. for business, then abruptly closed it, have plunged undrafted free agents into the most acute limbo of an uncertain off-season.
snippet: A series of court decisions that briefly opened the N.F.L. for business, then abruptly closed it, have plunged undrafted free agents into the most acute limbo of an uncertain off-season.
